# Attempting to extract the RCP data from the geotiff files
Advice online recommends opening the geotiff data files in R and then exporting them as other formats from R, we are going to attempt this

## Starting with the RCP 4.5 geotiff file
```{r}
library(raster)
library(gdalUtilities)
gdalinfo("tas_mean_C_ar5_5ModelAvg_rcp45_01_2006.tif")
```
